metadata.title: Men's Clothing | Urban Outfitters
metadata.description: Shop up and coming brands and trendy men's clothing at Urban Outfitters. Keep your look fresh with the latest arrivals in men's clothing, accessories and shoes. Receive free shipping for purchases of $50 or more on US orders.

openGraph.content: Shop up and coming brands and trendy men's clothing at Urban Outfitters. Keep your look fresh with the latest arrivals in men's clothing, accessories and shoes. Receive free shipping for purchases of $50 or more on US orders.

IsPartOf.name: New
IsPartOf.description: Shop all new arrivals at Urban Outfitters! Find all the latest in womens and mens clothing, home, lifestyle and beauty.

IsPartOf.name: Women's
IsPartOf.description: Shop women's clothes and find up and coming designers and fashions for women. Keep your style fresh with the latest arrivals for women's clothing.

IsPartOf.name: Men's
IsPartOf.description: Shop up and coming brands and trendy men's clothing at Urban Outfitters. Keep your look fresh with the latest arrivals in men's clothing, accessories and shoes. Receive free shipping for purchases of $50 or more on US orders.

IsPartOf.name: Shoes
IsPartOf.description: Step up your style with Urban Outfitters' collection of shoes. From sneakers to boots, sandals to heels, find your perfect pair for any occasion.

IsPartOf.name: Accessories
IsPartOf.description: Complete your look with Urban Outfitters' selection of accessories. Shop the newest styles in bags, hats, jewelry, and more for every unique style.

IsPartOf.name: Home
IsPartOf.description: Shop the latest trends in home decor at Urban Outfitters. You'll find unique and stylish home furniture + apartment decor & more to deck out your place.

IsPartOf.name: Lifestyle
IsPartOf.description: Shop Urban Outfitters lifestyle shop for a selection of wellness, gadgets, and sexual health products. Find personal massagers, essential oils, skateboards and more!

IsPartOf.name: Beauty
IsPartOf.description: Explore a range of beauty products at Urban Outfitters. From fragrances, skincare, and hair care to wellness supplements, we've got you covered.

IsPartOf.name: Vintage + ReMade
IsPartOf.description: Discover unique vintage and remade clothing at Urban Outfitters. Find authentic and exclusive upcycled pieces that blend past style with modern aesthetics.

IsPartOf.name: Sale
IsPartOf.description: Shop brand favorites, women's, men's, shoes, and apartment decor essentials on sale at Urban Outfitters. Check back often for the latest additions. Sign up for UO Rewards and get 10% off your next purchase.

Shop men's clothing and accessories at Urban Outfitters.
